pages.text: Some ingredients is not edible, but can still put into $(pot)Crock Pot$(). These ingredients are called Inedible ingredients. All of the inedible ingredients have 1.0 inedible value.$(br2)$(l)The following are inedible ingredients$()$(br)$(item)Stick$(), $(item)Bamboo$(), $(br)$(item)Bone$(), $(item)Blaze Rod$()
